name: Restoration
effect: Cures all status ailments except dead and stone

name: Divine Cure
effect: Adds 100 hit points if at or below maximum and adds one year of age

name: Divine Magic
effect: Adds 100 spell points if at or below maximum and adds one year of age

name: Divine Power
effect: Adds 20 to level and adds one year of age

name: Essence of Accuracy
effect: Can be used only once. Adds 15 to Accuracy and subtracts 5 from Luck permanently

name: Essence of Endurance
effect: Can be used only once. Adds 15 to Endurance and subtracts 1 from all other statistics permanently

name: Essence of Intellect
effect: Can be used only once. Adds 15 to Intellect and subtracts 5 from Might permanently

name: Essence of Luck
effect: Can be used only once. Adds 15 to Luck and subtracts 5 from Accuracy permanently

name: Essence of Might
effect: Can be used only once. Adds 15 to Might and subtracts 5 from Intellect permanently

name: Essence of Personality
effect: Can be used only once. Adds 15 to Personality and subtracts 5 from Speed permanently

name: Essence of Speed
effect: Can be used only once. Adds 15 to Speed and subtracts 5 from Personality permanently

name: Rejuvenation
effect: Removes all magical aging effects and subtracts 1 from all 7 primary statistics permanently
